team.title: Our team
team.joinText: Want to join the team? Reach out!

contact.title: Contact us
contact.text: If you want to enjoy an evening of Italian food and drinks, then you've come to the right place. We are open 6 days a week, from Tuesday to Sunday. From 10 is our wonderful terrace open to relax in the morning sun, our kitchen is open from 12 noon.
contact.phoneText: Call us anytime during opening hours at

database.welcome:
Benvenuti da Stappato! At Stappato we do everything we can to give you the ultimate Italian feeling!
'Stappato' means 'uncorked' in Italian. Under that cork we have a beautiful and purely Italian wine list, co-curated by Thiessen Wijnkoopers
On our small menu you will find a delicious selection of always fresh dishes. You can enjoy the antipasti, burratas, beautiful salads and fresh pasta on the terrace as if you were in the bella Italia. A freshly tapped glass of Birra Moretti or an ice-cold homemade limoncello complete the picture.
Special on the menu are the canederli, dumplings as they are eaten in Northern Italy and the Pinsa Romana, a delicious combination of pizza and focaccia in various flavors.
The attentive service is both Dutch (Mestreechs üòâ) and Italian by origin. In the restaurant and on the terrace, guests are served with great flair and experience.
database.timComment: Welcome to Stappato, a place to drink a delicious glass of wine with a small snack or to enjoy an authentic Italian dinner with the family. We are always ready to make you a warm cappuccino, to open a nice bottle of wine for you or to tap a nice glass of beer. Thanks to our small menu, we always have beautiful fresh products ready for you.
database.specialRequests: Your dining experience is our top priority! Do you have a special celebration, a large group gathering, or any unique requests in mind? We're here to make your visit extraordinary. For group reservations, special occasions, or any other personalized requests, please don't hesitate to reach out. Our team is dedicated to ensuring your time with us is tailored to your needs. Contact us today, and let's make your dining experience at Stappato exceptional. We look forward to hosting you and creating memorable moments together.

bio.tim: Tim can be found every day as a host at Stappato. Thanks to his knowledge of wines and his years of experience in the Maastricht catering industry, he knows how to serve everyone. üç∑ He‚Äôs also always up for a nice conversation about hockey, padel, Formula 1 and much more. üèé
bio.jordi: Jordi grew up in Roosendaal, however he has been living in Maastricht for a while. During his days off, he likes to play padel, go out for a hike or go out for diner. Of course he also loves to cook for his friends and family. That‚Äôs where he likes to experiment in the kitchen, and new dishes will be featured on the future menus of Stappato.
bio.ricardo: Ricardo will always greet you with a pleasant chat. Even a little in Italian. üáÆüáπ In his spare time, Ricardo likes to make music. He is a producer of all-round types of music such as techno, house and electro. You can find his records on Spotify! üéß
bio.breght: Breght likes to be active, in his spare time he likes to tinker with his old Renault 4, with which he will drive a rally through the Italian Alps each summer. In addition to his studies, he also helps people with computers and will happily uncork a nice bottle of wine for you! Or he will pour you a nice beer! üç∫
bio.david: You'll find David at Stappato mostly on weekends; he was born and grew up in Piedmont, Italy - home of Barbera, Nebbiolo, Arneis, Cortese, Barbaresco, and Dolcetto; he is currently studying Computer Science at UM.So try out your languages - Italian or Python - and program an insider tip on a good Italian wine!
bio.alessia: Alessia brings a true Italian sparkle to Maastricht. As much as Alessia appreciates her home country Italy she likes to explore living and studying abroad.After her previous study in Texas Alessia choose Maastricht to study International Business.Alessia enjoys playing Volleyball, hiking and travelling.The passionate and enthousiastic vibe that Alessia offers her guests at Stappato in combination with a cheerful smile or friendly word adds to an authentic atmosphere that normally only can be found in Italy.
